academicProjects.name: Industrial Emissions Impact on Louisiana’s Public Health
academicProjects.description: This group project aimed to investigate the impact of industrial emissions on public health in Louisiana, focusing on Ascension and Calcasieu counties. The team analyzed the Louisiana Department of Environmental Quality emissions inventory dataset from 1991 to 2022 using RStudio for data wrangling. The dataset included information about the amount and type of pollutants released by industrial facilities in Louisiana. The project identified the limitations of the dataset, which can impact the accuracy of measuring pollution from companies. The team also identified the top 15 cancer-causing chemicals and their sources, as recognized by the National Institutes of Health and the National Toxicology Program. This project used RStudio and data wrangling techniques to conduct an analysis of industrial emissions in Louisiana and their potential impact on public health.

academicProjects.name: Genetic Algorithms: AI learns how to play Seper Mario Land
academicProjects.description: Super Mario World is a classic platform game that involves traversing from point A to point B. To enhance the game's playability, an AI agent has been implemented using Genetic Algorithms, which are rooted in natural selection and genetics. The project's objective is to train an agent using N number of generations, with the aim of enabling it to complete at least the first level of World 1 by the N+1 generation. To accomplish this, the project requires the use of PyBoy, a GameBoy emulator built in Python, and Python itself.

academicProjects.name: Mac Map
academicProjects.description: The purpose of this group project is to create a tool that assists Macalester College students in locating their classrooms for various courses. The idea stemmed from personal experiences with the amount of time spent searching for a classroom each semester, particularly when unfamiliar with a particular building. This version of the tool was developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript as the primary programming languages.

academicProjects.name: ChowGirls Data Analysis, Consulting Team
academicProjects.description: This group project consisted in conducteing a comprehensive analysis of ChowGirls Kitchen's data from April 2020 - April 2021 using bar graphs to identify specific areas where waste reduction efforts can be implemented effectively. We also designed graphics that visually depict ChowGirls' commitment to sustainability and eco-friendliness along with the results that demonstrated this, which were featured on the company's website and social media channels.
